---
title: "Aorta facs {COLUMN} Supplementary Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(useful)
library(Seurat)
library(dplyr)
library(Matrix)
library(ontologyIndex)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

tissue_of_interest = capitalize('Aorta')
filename = paste0('facs_',tissue_of_interest, '_seurat_tiss.Robj')
load(here('00_data_ingest', '10_tissue_robj_downloaded', filename))

annotation = read_csv(here('00_data_ingest', '03_tissue_annotation_csv', paste0(tissue_of_interest, '_facs_annotation.csv')))



genes_to_check = sort(c('Vim','Krt5','Krt8','Ptprc','Epcam','H2-Ab1','H2-Aa','Cd34','Cdh5','Cd14','Vwf','Syk','Col1a2','Timp2','Cd74','Laptm5','Selplg','Pecam1','Fabp4','Sox18','Icam1','Tek','Vcam1','Vegfa','Adipor1','Car3','Alas2','Acta2','Dcn','Myocd','Tagln','Myh11','S100a4','Cd3e','Pdgfra','Kit','Gypa','Col6a3'))
```

```{r}

for (column in colnames(annotation)){
  tiss@meta.data[annotation$X1, column] = annotation[column]
  DotPlot(tiss, genes_to_check, col.max = 2.5, plot.legend = T, do.return = T, group.by = column) + coord_flip()
  TSNEPlot(object = tiss, do.return = TRUE, group.by = column)
  RidgePlot(tiss, genes_to_check, group.by = column)

}

```
